pageTitle: iTunes - Music - The Original Hits by Sylvester
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {20284=Original Hits sums up disco sensation Sylvester's years (1977-1981) with the Fantasy label. These years include most of the artist's most important output, particularly dancefloor hits like "You Make Me Feel (Mighty Real)," "Dance (Disco Heat)," and "Body Strong." In addition to these stellar dance tracks, songs like "Cry Me a River" and a live version of "You are My Friend" emphasize Sylvester's warmth and soulfulness. The album is shorter and less comprehensive than Fantasy's earlier Greatest Hits compilation, but all the same offers a good and, since it's one CD rather than two, likely more affordable introduction to one of the most exciting and energetic figures of the disco era., 125605=Copyright © 2014 Apple Inc. All rights reserved., 23878=Born: September 6, 1947 in Los Angeles, CA, 21689=Sylvester's music will tmake you feel mighty real. Don't stop...you are moving me...! Too bad his talent left this world in 1988 due to AIDS. His art is missed in this new dance era...}
